div.div: Throughout the years, Falcon Pride, the athletic booster club, has been grateful for the generosity of the community business owners. During this trying and unsettling time for local businesses, Falcon Pride will be giving back to them as a way to say thank you for their constant support. If you can help Falcon Pride support those who need it right now, please click their website at https://app.mobilecause.com/e/ei2QAw?vid=71k0z.

img.alt: FALCON_PRIDE_Gives_Back.png thumbnail168687

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

div.span: The Governor of New York has postponed the May 19 school budget vote and school board elections until at least June 1. Further information will be provided to residents regarding the date and manner of voting when the Governor provides further information on the topic. As for now, the District's scheduled budget related meetings are postponed, including the April 2 Budget Forum, with new dates not yet set.

img.alt: Untitled_design_-_2020-03-31T124724.702.png thumbnail168143

div.p: Community members without children in the schools can receive occasional emails on topics such as meeting dates, budget information and other items.
If you would like to receive these emails, please sign up here: http://www.lvcsd.k12.ny.us/form/default.aspx?261

img.title: Left Quote
img.alt: Quote Open

div.p: To educate the whole student and inspire in everyone a passion for life-long learning. To provide a safe and nurturing environment dedicated to academic excellence and the development of a student's autonomy, accountability and commitment to community.
